Html:
I have several markers on a single overlay. I want to be able to highlight specific markers. When I have multiple markers close by each other, sometimes the highlighted marker is underneath the other markers on that overlay.

Is there a way for me to push a specific marker to the top of the overlay so that is it above all the other markers on that overlay, and therefore visible.
remove marker from overlay, and add it again, so it will be on top again
